allow: Bash(python -c "import sys, json; offers = json.load(sys.stdin); print(f''''Found {len(offers)} offers''''); best = offers[0] if offers else None; print(f''''Best offer: ID={best[""id""]}, GPU={best[""gpu_name""]}, Price=$best["""dph_total"""]:.3f/hr, Location={best.get(""geolocation"", ""Unknown"")}'''') if best else print(''''No offers found'''')")
